text: The 2016 Cupa Ligii Final was the final match of the 2015–16 Cupa Ligii, played between Steaua București and Concordia Chiajna. Steaua București won the match with 2–1 after extra time. == Match == {| width=92% | |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK||1 || Florin Niță |- |DF ||4 || Gabriel Tamaș |- |DF ||15 || Marko Momčilović |- |DF ||13 || Alin Toșca |- |MF ||55 || Alexandru Bourceanu || || |- |DF ||44 || Gabriel Enache || |- |MF ||5 || Jugurtha Hamroun || |- |MF ||20 || Vlad Achim |- |MF ||10 || Nicolae Stanciu (c) || || |- |MF ||77 || Adrian Popa |- |FW ||9 || Alexandru Tudorie || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |FW ||14 || Bojan Golubović || || |- |MF ||19 || Adnan Aganović || || |- |MF ||11 || Sulley Muniru || |- |GK ||12 || Valentin Cojocaru |- |DF ||24 || Dan Popescu |- |FW ||16 || Robert Vâlceanu |- |DF ||2 || Gabriel Simion |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Laurențiu Reghecampf |} |valign="top"| | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK||34 || Cristian Bălgrădean (c) || |- |DF ||4 || Răzvan Tincu |- |DF ||21 || Bogdan Bucurică |- |DF ||26 || Patrice Feussi || || |- |DF ||5 || Cristian Melinte || |- |DF ||15 || Iulian Mamele || |- |MF ||18 || Marian Cristescu |- |MF ||99 || Bruno Madeira || || |- |MF ||95 || Răzvan Grădinaru || || |- |MF ||10 || Neluț Roșu || |- |FW ||30 || Marius Pena |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |MF ||7 || Tiberiu Serediuc || |- |FW ||17 || Florin Răsdan || |- |FW ||20 || Marian Constantinescu || |- |DF ||2 || Ștefan Bărboianu |- |MF ||33 || Adrian Cristea |- |DF ||3 || Cristian Albu |- |GK ||93 || Florin Iacob |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Emil Săndoi |} |- |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | width=50% valign=top| MATCH OFFICIALS *Assistant referees: ** Adrian Radu Ghinguleac ** Mircea Cristian Orbuleț *Fourth official: ** Adrian Viorel Cojocaru *Additional assistant referees: ** ** | width=50% valign=top| MATCH RULES *90 minutes. *30 minutes of extra-time if necessary. *Penalty shoot-out if scores still level. *Seven named substitutes. *Maximum of three substitutions. |} ==References== ==External links== * Official site 2016 Category:2015–16 in Romanian football 2016
